1550350.name: Net King's Call Demo
1550350.description: The demo for Net King’s Call, a fusion of both Turn-Based Strategy and Real Time Battles! Set in a future where the internet has become a world parallel to our own, different people and factions fight for control of the digital space. In this demo you'll play the first mission of the campaign, introducing you to some of our main characters and the basic game mechanics you can expect to see in the full game. Can you make it out of the ambush?
1550350.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
